page.title: 12ROSEMARKET COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: Rosemarket has had a Parish Council for more than 100 years.Twelve years ago its name was changed to Community Council.There are three types of council in the area _ the Community Council who look after Rosemarket and area;Preseli Council look after Haverfordwest and region; and Dyfed Council looks after the whole of Dyfed. There are 7 elected members and 1 clerk on the Community Council.There are elections every 4 years and members can be re_elected for further terms.Councillors have meetings 11 times a year,but if there is anything important to talk about they have an extra_ordinary meeting.The clerk's job is to take notes in all the meetings and to pay people to clean the bus shelters.The councillors do not get paid.
